mapper.insert: insert into major_course (` major_course_id`, ` major_id`, grade, course_id, type_id) values (#{majorCourseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select ` major_course_id`, ` major_id`, grade, course_id, type_id from major_course
